long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This simple extension improves your eye experience while you are reading IETF's RFCs. It does few things:

• Enlarges font size from 13px to 20px.
• Centers content.

The extension also allows you to use omnibox shortcut to easily jump to RFC by its ID:

1. Type "gorfc" in search bar.
2. Press Space or Tab key.
3. Enter RFC's ID, e.g. 2460.
4. Hit Enter.
